description.value:
A massive sphere of rock explodes, unleashing a cataclysm of falling debris and deadly shrapnel. Its destruction falls in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet. Creatures in the area take @Damage[9d10[bludgeoning]|traits:area-damage] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. Those who fail are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. For the next minute, rocks continue to fall, making the area difficult terrain and dealing @Damage[3d10[bludgeoning]] damage to any creature that ends its turn in the area. If you use this impulse again, any previous one ends.

Level (20th) The initial damage is @Damage[10d10[bludgeoning]], and the area damage is @Damage[4d10[bludgeoning]].
